title: I need help
body: i am having problems reconnecting to my games. I would start a game and nothing would show up and this causes my client to close and I have to re open it again. When I open the game it says that I can reconnect. However even if I press it, nothing happens. How can I fix this issue?

replies.body: It is not my connection issue, because I can enter through another device. But at the same time when I try to update it, it says that I need an alpha client and also my icon never changes.

This is likely caused by a *poor connection* to our gameservers since you're able to reach out patching and login servers. I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are good before we take a look at other potential causes along your route.

Let me know if these steps caused any change.
